about_the_game:
A certain zombie virus arrived on BOXHEAD World with a meteorite that fell by chance, causing the cells of many people with Type B blood to merge with the virus, quickly turning them into zombies. To survive in this purgatorial world, you must unleash every bullet into the hordes of the zombies and use any explosive objects at your disposal to drench every inch of the land in blood.

Boxhead: Immortal is a third person cartoon shooting game. It is created under the authorization of Fire Source Studio with the continuous series of Boxhead. This game is made possible with the previous work of Sean Cooper and the sponsorship of Crazy Monkey Games and the previous Boxhead is a series of highly acclaimed classic Flash games. This game continues and extends the classic art style and background settings from previous work. Moreover, our team has polished details of the maps and unique game features for your best gaming experience. In game, players can use firearms, oil buckets, and grenades to intensify the battle between humans and zombies. The game includes single player, multiplayer, as well as P2P multiplayer LAN connection. The game includes three game modes: Classic Mode, Endless Mode, and Campaign Mode. However, Classic Mode and Campaign Mode are still under development.

Classic Mode
1:1 replica of the details in the previous Boxhead games. This brings the original nostalgic experience!
In Classic Mode, there are 4 skins for you to choose that comes along with the classical maps with various layouts. Changing a map gives you the feeling of a brand new game. You can also get other useful weapons and props by picking up red boxes.

Endless Mode
With one or more players, the goal of this game mode is to face endless waves of zombie and try to survive as long as possible.
While retaining the classic core gameplay, the mode has undergone bold innovations. Rogue elements have been appropriately added to enrich the playability and replayability of the game. Before starting a game, players can not only choose from their own skins for their characters but also select from four different roles, each with multiple unique skills and attributes for players to mix and match. Additionally, there are several newly designed maps available for play.

Campaign Mode
Everything seems to start from the meteorite, or the government. Who knows? However all this does not matter with the problems you are facing - surviving is much more important.
Following the storyline, players will break through the zombie hordes step by step, then advance into cities overrun by the undead, and ultimately unravel the mystery to resolve the world crisis. This mode features multiple meticulously designed large maps, where players can explore, upgrade and customize their equipment, and eliminate wandering zombies. There are also highly challenging and powerful mutated zombie bosses. Centered around the storyline, a variety of intense and thrilling gameplay has been designed to provide players with diverse experiences. Additionally, specific scene props and vehicles are provided to assist players in combating the zombies.
